name: fingerprint
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
(informal print) the pattern of curved lines on the end of a finger or thumb that is different in every person, or a mark left by this pattern: His fingerprints were all over the gun.take fingerprints The police have taken fingerprints from every man in the neighbourhood.
Lambert/Archive Photos/GettyImages
US (UK fingermark) a mark left by dirt or oil from someone's finger on a clean surface

to record the pattern of someone's fingerprints: We would like to fingerprint every one of your employees.
